name: Bunny (Thomas L.)
description:
This is a game made in Game Maker Version 5 from 2005, updated with a few Quality of Life changes. It may not work as intended but it is here for archival purposes or if you just want to play it.

Story: Bunny is a Rabbit who lives in the Hop Hop Forest. One day the evil Trigazard, an evil wizard from the north, steals Bunny's Golden Carrot! Armed with his Carrot Bombs, Bunny must rise to the challenge and defeat the evil wizard!

- 5 Captivating Levels!

- Throw Carrot Bombs to Shatter Your Enemies!

- Midis from VG Music to grace your ears as you play!

- Terrible Humor from 2005! Do Not Look Back! It wasn't pretty!

Controls:

Arrow Keys Left and Right: Move Left and Right Respectively

Arrow Key Up: Enter Doorway

Z: Jump

X: Shoot Carrot Bomb
